#Text=Wail of sirens marks Holocaust
#Text=Remembrance Day in Israel
#Text=Thursday , May 1 , 2008
#Text=A 2-minute siren wail which began in Israel at 10 a.m.
#Text=Thursday marked the beginning of Yom HaShoah , the country 's Holocaust Remembrance Day .
#Text=Israelis across the nation paused their daily activities for a moment of silence in memory of the six million Jews murdered by Nazis in the Holocaust during World War II .
#Text=Drivers turned off their vehicles and stood at attention in the middle of the road , and pedestrians stopped and bowed their heads .
#Text=Names of victims were read aloud in the Knesset , the legislature of Israel .
#Text=Individuals laid wreaths at a memorial for the Warsaw Ghetto uprising at Yad Vashem , Israel 's official memorial to Jewish victims of the Holocaust .
#Text=National ceremonies began at Yad Vashem on Wednesday evening , with the lighting of a flame by a Holocaust survivor .
#Text=In all six torches were lit , in memory of the six million Jews who died during the Holocaust .
#Text=Approximately 270,000 survivors of the Holocaust live in Israel today , 80,000 of whom survived Nazi death camps .
#Text=Entertainment venues , theaters , and movie cinemas closed shop at sundown Wednesday .
#Text=Television stations and radio programming focused on memorial of the Holocaust .
#Text=Memorial events end at sunset on Thursday , and will be followed one week later by the 60th anniversary of the declaration of independence of Israel in 1948 , known as Yom Ha'atzmaut .
#Text=A leader who plans mass destruction , together with weapons of mass destruction .
#Text=What would have been left of our world ?
#Text=— Shimon Peres
#Text=Shimon Peres , Israel 's President , spoke at Yad Vashem , and compared the potential danger which Israel says is posed by Iran 's nuclear program , to that faced by Jews during the Holocaust .
#Text=" In history , it is forbidden to be late , " said Peres , saying that the world reacted too late to Adolf Hitler and Nazi Germany .
#Text=" My heart shudders when I recall that there was a possibility that Hitler could acquire nuclear weapons .

#Text= The Israeli Holocaust - the whole thing was a joke , and part of the perfect show that ( Zionist leader and future Israeli prime minister ) Ben Gurion put on , " said head of the Palestinian Centre for Strategic Research Amin Dabur , according to Jerusalem -based Palestinian Media Watch .

column1: #Text=Dabur said that the " young energetic and able " went to Israel , and that those who were disabled were sent " so there would be a Holocaust " .
#Text=Though Iran has said that its nuclear program is peaceful in nature , the United States , Israel , and other countries believe it is attempting to construct nuclear weapons .
#Text=In speeches Iran 's President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has said that the Jewish state should be destroyed .
#Text=Ahmadinejad has called the Holocaust " a myth " .
#Text=Tehran hosted a revisionist Holocaust conference in 2006 , which provoked international criticism .
#Text=Tel Aviv University published a study on Monday saying that acts of anti-Semitism in 2007 increased by about seven percent over 2006 .
